data.title: Southwest Airlines
data.meta_description: Southwest Airlines | 701,880 followers on LinkedIn. We run on Southwest Heart! | At Southwest¬Æ, everything we do‚Äîfrom our smiling People to our policies‚Äîis designed to let you go with Heart. No matter what comes up in your travels, we‚Äôve got your back. Because while any airline can fly you, only Southwest lets you go with Heart.
data.text:
This week we celebrate 10 incredible years of flying to Mexico! From our very first flight, where we were greeted by Mayan warriors on the ramp, to now, we‚Äôve created countless memories and connections with our amazing Customers and Employees. As we look back on this journey, we are grateful for the vibrant cultures, stunning destinations, and the friendships we've built along the way. Thank you to everyone who has flown with us and made this journey possible. Here‚Äôs to many more years of adventure and exploration together!

We‚Äôve been cookin‚Äô up some magic with Visit Orlando, New Orleans & Company, and Walt Disney World! In celebration of Walt Disney World Resort‚Äôs new attraction, Tiana‚Äôs Bayou Adventure, we flew 24 aspiring chefs from Louisiana to embark upon a culinary adventure of a lifetime at Walt Disney World Resort in Orlando. In partnership with Visit Orlando, Walt Disney World, and New Orleans & Company we had the opportunity to whisk these young chefs away onboard a flight from New Orleans to Orlando and back after a few days of nonstop fun. They were greeted at the gate with a classic New Orleans party, complete with a jazz band, second line, and Disney goodies ‚Äì just another Tuesday in the bayou state! The party continued inflight where everyone was surprised with Tiana‚Äôs cookbook full of creole recipes and other keepsakes. The group enjoyed a ride down the bayou of Walt Disney World‚Äôs new attraction inspired by, ‚ÄúThe Princess and The Frog.‚Äù Did you know Tiana‚Äôs character was modeled after the late, great Leah Chase, lovingly known as the Queen of Creole Cuisine? Stella, Leah‚Äôs daughter and Zoe, Leah‚Äôs great-granddaughter joined the trip, inspiring these young ladies with advice along their four-day journey. While the ride was the main attraction, the chefs were dazzled by the magic of Walt Disney World with exclusive culinary experiences, tours of famed restaurants, and advice from seasoned executive chefs at the Most Magical Place on Earth. We loved cooking up a good time with our Customers and Employees alike as we hosted this talented group who, like Princess Tiana, are ‚ÄòAlmost There‚Äô in reaching their dreams.

We‚Äôre celebrating 10 years of Repurpose with Purpose, our award-winning global environmental sustainability initiative that upcycles aircraft seat leather! With the help of community partners across the globe, we have upcycled more than one million pounds of aircraft seat leather, fostering sustainable solutions with a transformative community impact. Earlier this year, students from the Austin area were treated to a tour of the Austin-Bergstrom International Airport (AUS) where their art, made with upcycled leather, is on display. In partnership with EcoRise, Southwest connected leather to classrooms, providing students with hands-on experiences in sustainability, creative reuse, and environmental literacy via EcoRise curriculum. Check out the exhibit on display at Austin Airport until September, 2024.

This week, we celebrated the launch of our newest partnership with the National Park Foundation! Our extensive network now serves as a gateway to over 400 breathtaking national parks across the country. From the towering sequoias of Yosemite to the otherworldly landscapes of Yellowstone, the great outdoors are calling! To kick off this 'park-ticularly' epic collaboration, we surprised Passengers on two lucky flights to Bozeman and Fresno with an explorer's dream package: üêª America the Beautiful passes (a full year of National Park access!) ‚úàÔ∏è Eco-friendly reusable water bottles üéí Adventure-ready backpacks ü•æ Stylish sunglasses for those sunny trails Ready for your own wild adventure? Enter our contest by July 29th for your chance to win the ultimate Bozeman getaway. Think majestic mountains, pristine lakes, and unforgettable memories waiting to be made. Learn more and enter here: https://swa.is/3Sr6x7X NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. Open to legal residents of the 50 U.S. and D.C. (excluding Alaska and Rhode Island) age 19 or older at time of entry. Void where prohibited. For Official Rules and Privacy Policy, visit https://swa.is/4cVCsFF

We‚Äôre continually evolving to meet the needs of our Customers. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre excited to announce some big changes designed to enhance your Customer Experience‚Äîstill delivered with our same Southwest Heart: ‚úÖ Assigned seating (expected to become bookable in 2025) ‚úÖ Premium seating options (expected to become bookable in 2025) ‚úÖ Red-eye flights (now available for booking on https://swa.is/3YkeYpw!) The research is clear and indicates that more than 80% of Southwest Customers prefer an assigned seat. These changes come as a part of our ongoing commitment to enhance the Customer experience, including faster WiFi, new in-seat power, larger overhead bins, and more comfortable seats. For now, it's business as usual - we're working hard to meet Customer expectations and expect seating changes to become bookable in 2025. We look forward to welcoming you onboard with the same Southwest Hospitality that you know and love. Learn more about these upcoming changes: https://swa.is/4cVnAY2

This year marks 25 years of us hiring Interns! What better way to celebrate National Intern Day AND National Hire a Veteran Day tomorrow than by highlighting one of our own? Farhan is now a Crew Scheduling Strategy & Portfolio Manager, but he started as an Intern in our People (HR) Department. His career in the Navy began right out of high school, and he continued to serve throughout college, his internship, and his early career. Transitioning from an internship to a full-time role, Farhan was able to manage his civilian and military careers simultaneously. He‚Äôs held various positions at Southwest and moved into a Leadership role last year. Farhan is proud to connect with and mentor current Interns while also participating in our ‚ÄúHeart With Heart‚Äù program that transports loved ones and fallen service members to their final resting place. He does all this while leading the Crew Scheduling Strategy & Portfolio Team. ‚ÄúThe Southwest Family has supported me through all my career changes, and I‚Äôve always felt encouraged to explore my passions and interests. I carry a sense of pride for Southwest even when I‚Äôm not at work, and I‚Äôm grateful for everything this Company has blessed me, my family, and all of our Cohearts with.‚Äù We employ more than 10,200 military members and 1,800 military spouses and are grateful for their sacrifices and contributions. As we celebrate 25 years of our Intern Program, we proudly recognize Farhan for his dedication to our Company and Country! Learn more about military hiring and our Southwest Programs on our careers site: careers.southwestair.com

Have you been to the Albuquerque International Balloon Fiesta? Don't let this bucket list item float away. We've added more flights to and from ABQ this October so that you don't have to be the odd balloon out and you can join the hundreds of colorful hot air balloons in New Mexico. üéà Don't get tied down by other plans‚Äîbook your tickets now and be part of the mass ascension!
